## IReducerFn type

Reducer function  T - item type, of the collection being reduced  R - reduced value

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type IReducerFn<T, R> = (
accumulator: R, 
collectionItem: T, 
key: string | number, 
from: Dict<T>) => R;
```
